short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension finds if the current page was submitted to Reddit and shows you the comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find if the current site you're on has already been submitted to reddit. If it has, the extension will open a new tab directing you to read other users' submissions.

This app is open source: https://github.com/ChrisGuzman/search-comments
